directions: Stir cream cheese, sour cream, creamy salad dressing, and taco seasoning together in a bowl until smooth; spread into a flat square or round dish. Spread salsa over cream cheese mixture layer; sprinkle with Cheddar cheese, tomato, green bell pepper, and green onions. Chill until flavors blend, at least 1 1/2 hours.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
title: Mexican Cheese Cake
